Morrungulo (also known as Nelson's Bay) turnoff is some 7 km North of

on the main EN1 highway. Turn off at marked Resort sign and go 13 Km East down to the beach on a good dirt road. Morrungulo is a family run holiday resort on the secluded clean white beaches of the Indian Ocean.

Accessed by own vehicle. 4x4 not required.
Chill out, swim, fish, scuba dive, bar, resturant
New Bar and Resturant serve good simple meals with Fish dishes straight from the sea.
Clean fresh tap water for drinking on site from own spring/wells.

Chalets, Cassita's and camping on the edge of the beach.
All abloutions in Ponta Morrungulo section have gas geysers and power points are available on a daily connection basis from resort power/generators.

Accommodation covers camping through to self catering chalets on the beach front. Resort has its own clean and safe fresh water supply from a natural spring.
Resort has a Scuba Dive and Fishing Tour operator on site.

Latitude: 23°14'00.80"S
Longitude: 35°29'31.00"E

No Quad Bikes allowed in Camp.

Boat launch requires purchase of Mozambique Port Authority BOAT LICENCES.
All of Mozambique is a Malaria area.
